channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache HertzBeat
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache HertzBeat

item.title: CVE-2024-42323|2024-09-21T09:30:15.295Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20hertzbeat
item.description:
SnakeYaml Deser Load Malicious xml rce vulnerability in Apache HertzBeat (incubating).Â
This vulnerability can only be exploited by authorized attackers. This issue affects Apache HertzBeat (incubating): before 1.6.0.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 1.6.0, which fixes the issue.
